mapper.sql: select s.stock_id, s.sku_name, s.sku_code, s.stock_status, s.sku_lot1, s.occupy_qty, s.stock_qty - s.pick_qty - s.occupy_qty stock_enable, s.stock_qty - s.pick_qty stock_balance, s.wsu_code, s.has_serial, s.loc_code, s.loc_id, s.zone_code, s.box_code, s.udf2, s.udf1, s.lpn_code, s.sku_lot2, s.sku_lot3, s.sku_lot4, s.sku_lot5, s.sku_lot6, s.sku_lot7, s.sku_lot8, s.wh_code, wo.owner_code, wo.owner_name, s.last_in_time, s.last_out_time from wms_stock s left join wms_owner wo on s.wo_id = wo.wo_id left join wms_zone wz on s.zone_id = wz.zone_id left join wms_location loc on loc.loc_id = s.loc_id
mapper.delete: delete from wms_stock where stock_qty = pick_qty and TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(update_time) >= 30
